      • Base64

        public Base64(byte[] unencodedSource)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        unencodedSource - byte array source. The content of this array should be unencoded.

      • Base64

        public Base64(java.lang.String unencodedSource)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        unencodedSource - String source. The content of this string should be unencoded.

      • Base64

        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        unencodedSource - buffer. The content of this buffer should be unencoded.

      • getEncodedArray

        @Nullable
public byte[] getEncodedArray()
        Gets the base 64 encoded byte array.

        Note: the base 64 encoding happens every time this method is called.

        Returns:
        a byte array.

      • getEncodedString

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getEncodedString()
        Gets a String containing the base 64 encoded characters.

        Note: the base 64 encoding happens every time this method is called.

        Returns:
        a string.

public java.nio.ByteBuffer getEncodedBuffer()

        Note: the base 64 encoding happens every time this method is called.

        Returns:
        a buffer.
